#StandWithUkraine 🇺🇦
#SupportUkraine ✊

What can we do to help? (12/n)

Many more ways to #SupportUkraine 🇺🇦
#UkraineWillPrevail 💪

https://t.co/tXBfwpnJmw

@LomvardasLab @CellCellPress Indeed! #UkraineWillPrevail When we asked Dr. Zazhytska whether she'd like to cancel her seminar due to the severe distress, she replied emphatically, "I WILL present - this is what I can do for my country"🇺🇦❤️‍🔥✊

#StandWithUkraine #SupportUkraine #ScienceForUkraine

@Ben_S_Huang @CellCellPress Thank you Ben! Witnessing Dr. Zazhytska's ferocious efforts to perform such heroic
 experiments and to get this work published, I feel certain that Ukraine will hold!

#StandWithUkraine 🇺🇦
#SupportUkraine ✊

Recommended by Dr. Zazhytska: Here you can read almost real-time news of what’s going on from Ukrainian journalists

https://t.co/fCz3Xl2Y5F

Dr. Zazhytska's 🤯work was just published @CellCellPress https://t.co/PudXjEZR0q

Before she could celebrate, however, her world -and our world - was darkened by the Russian invasion of UKRAINE🇺🇦 

Come support her @ FINS on 3/1 & learn how we can #StandWithUkriane ⬆️OPEN TO ALL

#StandWithUkriane 🇺🇦

What can we do to help? (11/n)

Many more ways to #SupportUkraine 🇺🇦
from @Ukr_Institute 
https://t.co/HKzrrYsZXw

#StandWithUkriane 🇺🇦
#SupportUkraine ✊

What can we do to help?
(10/n)

1. Spread Information
2. Contact Your Representatives
3. Donate to Ukraine
4. Join Protests
5. Put Up 🇺🇦 Flag to Show Solidarity

https://t.co/ZyFIHrig6D
